name: Tactical Charge
description: Camel Lancers charge faster, more often, and for longer distances than other heavy cavalry. Camel Lancers deals -25% less baseline charge damage. Each second spent charging increases the charge damage (up to +40%).
descriptionCN: 与其他重装骑兵相比，骆驼长矛骑兵的冲锋速度更快，发起冲锋的频率更高，距离也更长。骆驼长矛骑兵所造成的基线冲锋伤害 -25%。冲锋所用的每秒时间可提高冲锋的伤害 (最高达 +40%)。
